ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 153
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, they re dropped in OOT.  A great place to buy things is either GFay (Kelethin) or at the bank in North Freeport.  A lot of high level folks sell their
ygData.messageBody:
> >then start saving up:
> >Bracer of Erolisi (ac5 5str) 30pp from OOT
> They sell stuff in OOT, where? On that island in the middle? Can u wear 2
> of these then?

No, they're dropped in OOT. A great place to buy things is either GFay
(Kelethin) or at the bank in North Freeport. A lot of high level folks sell
their wares there. The Bracers of Erollisi are a lore item, so you can only
wear one. I'm probably going to buy one today. I'd considered getting
another Serp Bracer, but I think I'd rather have the 5AC and 5 STR.

> >Jagged bands (ac5 3str) 30-50pp from Unrest
> Not sure where Unrest is..

Unrest is located in Dagnor's Cauldron, which you get to from the
Butcherblock Mountains on Faydwer. It's a pretty good place for people all
the way from level 13-40 or so. Gotta watch out for trains, however.

-Raean Bloodyhands, soon to be 25th level, Tunare.
